TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridTextBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle

summary.span: 在 的单元格中承载 控件以便编辑字符串。

span.span: Hosts a control in a cell of a for editing strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自 `abstract` 类 。The class derives from the `abstract` class . 在运行时， 承载 允许用户编辑文本的控件。At run time, the hosts a control that allows users to edit text. 添加到类的特殊属性包括 、和 。Special properties added to the class include , and . 使用这些属性可以访问承载的 控件及其属性，并设置显示值的格式。These properties allow you to access the hosted control and its attributes, and set the format for displaying values. 如果数据源是一个 包含 对象， 则的属性 应设置为可在文本框控件中以逻辑方式编辑的数据类型。If the data source is a containing objects, the property of the should be set to a data type that can logically be edited in a text box control. 以下数据类型自动与 a 关联 ：、、、、、、、、、、 和 。The following data types are automatically associated with a : , , , , , , , , , , , and . > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 不完全支持以下类型： 、 、、 和 。The following types are not fully supported by Visual Basic: , , , , and . 不允许使用 (运算符。 ) (Operators are not allowed.) ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并将其添加到的 。The following example creates a and adds it to the of a . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到具有名为的窗体中， `dataGrid1` 并从的构造函数调用它 。To run this code example, paste it into a form that has a named `dataGrid1` and call it from the constructor of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会进行检查以确保确实发生了编辑。The method checks to ensure that an edit is indeed occurring. 如果是这样，则会相应地设置值的格式。If so, it formats the value appropriately. 如果值为 `null` ，则该方法将输入 到列中; 否则，它将使用 方法来提交值。If the value is `null`, the method enters into the column; otherwise, it uses the method to commit the value. 在 提交编辑操作时，将调用方法。The method is called by the when an editing operation is committed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 站点在所 编辑的单元格的位置上的控件。The sites a control on the grid at the location of the cell being edited. 要开始编辑操作时，方法由类的方法调用。The method is called by the class's method when an editing operation is about to begin. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法更改控件中被单击的单元格的文本 。The following example uses the method to change the text of a clicked cell in the control. [!code-cpp[Classic DataGridTextBoxColumn.Edit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridTextBoxColumn.Edit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridTextBoxColumn.Edit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridTextBoxColumn.Edit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridTextBoxColumn.Edit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridTextBoxColumn.Edit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指定格式化文本的方法的一个或多个字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character(s) that specify how text is formatted.

value.span: 指定格式化文本的方法的一个或多个字符。

span.span: The character or characters that specify how text is formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定如何在列中显示值。The property specifies how values are displayed in the column. 例如，将属性设置为 "c" 可指定将值设置为本地货币格式。For example, set the property to "c" to specify that the values will be formatted as the local currency. 计算机的用于 确定实际货币格式。The for the computer is used to determine the actual currency format. 更改数据时，这些值将自动无格式地转换为本机类型。The values are automatically unformatted to the native type when data is changed. 有关设置字符格式的详细信息，请参阅 [格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types) 和 [自定义日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings)。For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings). 所应用的格式应该适用于数据类型。The format you apply should be appropriate to the data type. 例如，如果数据在性质上是数字，请使用其中一个数值格式字符串。For example, if the data is numeric in nature use one of the numeric format strings. 可以 通过将 属性设置为 使用适当区域性 ID 构造的新实例来更改的。You can change the for a by setting the property to a new instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID. 若要为 应用程序设置，请将 对象的属性设置 为 使用适当区域性 ID 构造的新实例。To set the for the application, set the property of the object to a new instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的 对象，并将其分配给 对象的属性 。The following example creates a new object and assigns it to the property of a object. 该示例还将 属性设置为 "c"，以指定该列应将值显示为货币。The example also sets the property to "c" to specify that the column should display values as currency. [!code-cpp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CPP/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CS/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/VB/datagridtextboxcolumn format.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于确定格式化值的方法的特定区域性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the culture specific information used to determine how values are formatted.

value.span: 实现 接口的一个对象，如 类。

span.span: An object that implements the interface, such as the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将 属性设置为某个格式设置字符时，将 使用属性提供的信息 来进一步指定要使用的特定于区域性的格式设置。When setting the property to one of the formatting characters, the uses the information provided by the property to further specify what cultural-specific formatting to use. 例如，如果将 属性设置为 "c" 格式为 "c" ("货币") ，则可以进一步指定使用里拉的符号。For example, when the property is set to the format character "c" (for currency), you can further specify that the symbol for the lira be used. 为此，请创建一个 具有意大利区域设置 ID 的新对象，然后将 属性设置为新的 对象。To do this, create a new object with the locale ID for Italy, and set the property to the new object. 有关设置字符格式的详细信息，请参阅 [格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types) 和 [自定义日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings)。For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的 对象，并将其分配给 对象的属性 。The following example creates a new object and assigns it to the property of a object. 该示例还将 属性设置为 "c"，以指定该列应将值显示为货币。The example also sets the property to "c" to specify that the column should display values as currency. [!code-cpp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CPP/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CS/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/VB/datagridtextboxcolumn format.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在 中获取单元格的高度。

span.span: Gets the height of a cell in a .
The height of a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值 是通过添加列字体的大小和边距值计算得出的。The value returned by is calculated by adding the size of the column's font plus a margin value.
